stanza.line: Who is it that says most which can say (a)more(/a)
Than this rich praise that you alone are (b)you(/b)
In whose confine immured is the (a)store(/a)
Which should example where your equal (b)grew(/b)
Lean penury within that pen doth (c)dwell(/c)
That to his subject lends not some small (d)glory(/d)
But he that writes of you if he can (c)tell(/c)
That you are you so dignifies his (d)story(/d)
Let him but copy what in you is (e)writ(/e)
Not making worse what nature made so (f)clear(/f)
And such a counterpart shall fame his (e)wit(/e)
You to your beauteous blessings add a (g)curse(/g)
Being fond on praise which makes your praises (g)worse(/g)
